title: 'Boys and Girl - Cowboys Schedule; HOF'er Michael Irvin and Tony Casillas Talk Offseason; Lincoln Riley on CeeDee Lamb, Dallas Rumors
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Cowboys Schedule; HOF'er Michael Irvin and Tony Casillas Talk Offseason; Lincoln Riley on CeeDee Lamb, Dallas Rumors
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby visit with Oklahoma head coach Lincoln Riley about CeeDee Lamb, Neville Gallimore, and how much interest Dallas showed in him this past winter. Plus, former Cowboys Michael Irvin and Tony Casillas stop by with their takes on the biggest stories surrounding America’s Team.

Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
